text:
Hello everybody, I joined the group after coming across it last week and wanted to intro myself. I’m a freelance writer/marketer (shameless plug - if anyone needs some writing - I’d love to connect!). I started my career in media, working as a news producer for an iHeartMedia radio station and then as a digital journalist covering the NBA. I made the shift into marketing when I took a gig as a content specialist for a hospitality company based in Las Vegas. 

If I’ve piqued your interest, you can learn more about me by visiting my personal website. I have writing samples on there, too. :slightly_smiling_face:

<https://santiagos.space|https://santiagos.space>

attachments.title: Jon Santiago | Examinations in Patience, Practice, and Process
attachments.text: Jon Santiago is a freelance writer. This site shares what he learns about a variety of subjects including travel, career, health, and more.
attachments.fallback: Jon Santiago: Jon Santiago | Examinations in Patience, Practice, and Process
